title: PBE link not loading.
body: I had a pbe account in the past and wanted to check if it was active so I could try the new champs, however the link will not load. I tried using different browsers and nothing worked. Is there an issue or any way to download the pbe client and play without using the link?

replies.body:
I went ahead and pulled up your account so I could find that old PBE profile, and it looks like it's still active! We've been having a few issues with our sign up, but lucky for you I have this handy-dandy download link ready ^_^! 

[**PBE PC**](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/PBE_Client_Shell.zip) and [**PBE Mac**](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/League%20of%20Legends%20PBE.dmg)
